pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, December 7, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on supporting Indigenous-led conservation and hold a media availability. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the event
  • Open coverage of announcement and media availability
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:15 a.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the Secretary-General of the United Nations, António Guterres. Minister of Foreign Affairs Mélanie Joly will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a discussion with members of the Environment and Climate Change Youth Council. Minister of Environment and Climate Change Steven Guilbeault will also be in attendance.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity at the start of the meeting
